issue.title: [Rust] Support field metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10259](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10259). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The biggest hurdle to adding field metadata is HashMap and HashSet not implementing Hash, Ord and PartialOrd.

I was thinking of implementing the metadata as a Vec<(String, String)> to overcome this limitation, and then serializing correctly to JSON.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10259?focusedCommentId=17260332) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9025
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9025>
